description:
Severino is a South American dude who has been in the US about 6 years. His accent is pretty thick but his English is likely better than mine, well, at least my grammar! He is married, but I don't think his wife knew the extent of his video shoots.
He dances in clubs, and also does personal training. He used to be a BMX racer, and got quite a few scars from a lot of crashes. He broke his femur and that was pretty much the end of racing bikes.
Severino has a big Latin uncut cock on him, so I thought he would be a great way to kick-off Monster Cock Week. It has a pretty good hook on it, and depending on the angle it looks normal-sized, but when he lets it hang, it truly is a hefty cock!
He likes to show off, and working the camera for us was easy.
Enjoy him again later this week as we see if we can get someone to suck the cum out of his fat cock!
title: Severino - Solo
